title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-host LLMs (Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, …) behind a REST API and CLI.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API (npm: ollama).

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama (PyPI: ollama).

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models as LLMs or chat models.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-enhanced CLI wrapper with REPL, prompts library, and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline code suggestions.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot integration for Ollama with streaming replies and thread support.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI service exposing Ollama endpoints with auth, rate-limit, and OpenAPI docs.

title: ollama-k8s
summary: Helm charts and manifests to run Ollama in Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app integrating Ollama for chat completions and embeddings.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat interface for Ollama with session memory and model picker.

title: ollama-nest
summary: NestJS module providing injectable Ollama service with RxJS streams.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate (ollama-rs) for typed interactions with the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-go
summary: Community Go client for Ollama with generated structs and streaming support.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with async enumerable streaming and DI extensions.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders.

title: awesome-ollama
summary: Curated list of tools, libraries, and projects in the Ollama ecosystem.
